website_summaries.verdict: A backpack with holes for your dogs legs to go through, allowing you to take him with you to work or on adventures.
pros: Available in different sizes and has one of the highest weight capacities we've seen (up to 35 lbs.)
Ideal for a leisurely bike ride with a calm dog
Chest straps help distribute the weight from being concentrated on your back
cons: Dogs with longer legs may not be able to get comfortable
Chest straps can break off easily

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! It was great for my 3 mile bike ride and shopping in the mall. My boy is a pretty tall shiba that weighs 23 lbs. he is heavy on my shoulders but it's also a great workout for me. I was scared it wasn't going to hold up but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: SilentRiDE

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe how expensive this product is. Just a ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how expensive this product is. Just a layer of thin maybe durable fabric. We have 25 pounds corgi. When we put her in it, there is nothing to support her back in her begging position. We returned the products immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: It’s a really great product but there’s a few things I don’t like so much.
customer_reviews.text: I love it but there are a few things about it I don’t like so much first of all the bottom is shaped awkward for a dog to really fit comfortably. My dog tends to end up with her lower body sideways with her upper body twisted. Another problem I have with it is the top clips strap doesn’t stay tight. I’m going to be adding Velcro to keep the strap tight so my dog stays secure because any time she moves the strap looses up. Other then that it seems to be a good product. I’ll be using it a lot so I’ll see how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Charles & Rosanna Kaelble

customer_reviews.title: Serious carrier for walking/hiking
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to carry my blind dog when we take a long walk. He fits in it nicely and doesn't mind being in it at all. I'd give it 5 stars, but I would like to see more cushion in the bottom and a few comfort features for the wearer (the straps dig in a bit on me and it gets hot). Overall it's a great carrier and way better than the cheaper options out there, especially if your dog is over 10 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: CLF

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my shih-tzu
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16lb shih-tzu and two 45lb rescue shepherd lab mixes that love to hike. The little one can't keep up with the big ones, try as he might and often I have to carry him for a while. I had a backpack that was sufficient, but it gave me back pain so I had to stop bringing him. I heard about this brand and bought one. It is amazing quality and it distributes the weight much better so it's more comfortable for both of us. He fits perfectly in the medium size . I love this thing and now my little buddy doesn't have to stay home while we are all out having fun.
customer_reviews.author: P.J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my corgis.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect transport for my corgis when they get too tired for our long walks. They are both still young so they tire out before us. The material is breathable so they don’t overheat while in there and the side pockets are perfect for treats and their travel water bottle. I recommend this to anyone looking for a dependable backpack to hold their precious cargo.
customer_reviews.author: KCayea

customer_reviews.title: Great dog pack!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this so that our 20 lb Westie could join us on our electric scooter rides around the neighborhood and when running errands. He loves it!! He will stand on our shoulders and catch the wind as if he is riding in a car.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Cea

customer_reviews.title: It's very durable and sturdy. My dog is a little chubby for her ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nervous Chihuahua mix along with a pair of doggles for the motorcycle. It's very durable and sturdy. My dog is a little chubby for her size, (she's 16 inches measured as the chart shows, but 25 lbs) and there is plenty of room for her. I like that everything is adjustable so she feels secure. Great purchase worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: ProAmazoner

customer_reviews.title: Best way to travel with a small dog. A hot back is your gift with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: While I think I got one size too big for my 12.5 lb Yorkie, this carrier is where it's at. Good positioning for the dog, side vents help with airflow, whistle is a nice touch, pockets too. I have used it to travel on public transportation and while riding my bike. My pup is solidly in there no matter what bending or activity I am doing. My only issue, and I am sure can't be helped, is no amount of "breathable" fabric will cool down a hot dog belly on a hot human back. #sorrynotsorry
customer_reviews.author: Kysha H.

customer_reviews.title: Best dog Carrier. Hands down.
customer_reviews.text: My little guy gets tired when we hike. We’ve tried tons of different packs for him. He never relaxed like he does in the K9 sack. He’s comfortable and relaxed the whole time in it. And even better, it’s comfortable for the human to wear. This company killed it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for a dog who has longer legs and is a bit stiff due to age
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this because it was so difficult to get my mini poodle (who is 14 and a bit stiff) into the pack. She hated it, and since she is leggy her legs stuck out past my ears. I think this might be useful for a dog with shorter legs who is young and agile. Pack appeared to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke on first zip.
customer_reviews.text: I took my 12 year old pup on a hike and this zipper immediately broke while I was putting him in. Do not buy this bag, it's pretty much just garbage.
customer_reviews.author: L. S.

customer_reviews.title: Only issue is that she gets pretty heavy pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: We have a 26lb mutt and she fits perfectly in the XL. If anything it's a little too big for her. Only issue is that she gets pretty heavy pretty quickly. The chest strap helps, but the addition of a waist strap would be a total game changer in terms of distribution of weight.
customer_reviews.author: missgordTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Dog Approved
customer_reviews.text: My dog has little legs and can’t do very long walks. When he needs a boost I put him in the backpack and he loves it. There’s no struggle to get in the bag- he actually looks forward to the ride. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Great for bike rides
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We needed something to take our small beagle on bike rides and this is perfect. She seems to love it and it is pretty comfortable to wear. It fit both my husband who is 5’8 and 230 lbs and myself who is 5’2 and 170 lbs well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Langford

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! My dachshund Nash is getting older and can’t make it on our hikes. So this backpack has been a real lifesaver!! Nash is about 22 lbs so finding ge right size was tough! I bought a large and it’s perfect. It has enough room for high and his tail and he seems so comfortable when we walk. It’s also adjustable and very comfortable for me to wear as well. Definitely would by it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Jageman11

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made...Broke on First Use.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this backpack. I just received it last week and went to use it for the first time today. Zipper broke on the back and my pup fell out. I don't recommend this cheaply made backpack. Pay more money and get something more solid for the safety of your dog.
customer_reviews.author: CJ J.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The first perk is being able to take my pup anyways especially on my moped but I also think a perk worth mentioning is the people’s reactions to how hilarious but wonderful this backpack looks with the pup loving every second. My dog is about 40lb.. which I think is the max limit I would consider carrying for comfort wise. But it has been perfect for all the adventures wish there was a little bit larger size! I’ll be sad when she outgrows it.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle Oosten

customer_reviews.title: would highly recommend for anyone with a dog that cant walk on ...
customer_reviews.text: recieved large size when i asked for medium. seller promptly exchanged. would highly recommend for anyone with a dog that cant walk on its own for long distances.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin T. Wicke

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your travel pup.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pack (large), I have a full grown mini-bull terrier pup who is about 30+ lbs. My pup loves it and he enjoys being in it. It takes some getting used to but once you associate a positive reinforcement with it they look forward to being in it.
customer_reviews.author: LookSquirrel

customer_reviews.title: Abby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this carrier for a little Frenchbulldog. Abby is only 16 lbs. and has a spinal issues so walking is hard for her. This backpack allows she to go where her wheels will not. Keeps her warm too.
customer_reviews.author: RealEstatePro

customer_reviews.title: He is pretty long too
customer_reviews.text: We have a 16 pound Dachshund. He is pretty long too. This is a perfect fit and he seems comfortable riding in it. We get stopped every time we go out, with people asking where we got our pet carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: our long 25lbs dog fits!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic doggie carrier. Our sausage dog part black lab part corgi or something fits in the LARGE perfectly. The shoulder straps could be thicker as they do tend to dig into the shoulders. But otherwise great fun! Dog tax
customer_reviews.author: pfictionfan4life

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure if my 12 lb doxie would like it, but once I got him in it ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came very fast ... I wasn't sure if my 12 lb doxie would like it, but once I got him in it (was very easy), he was so calm and happy. He didn't want to get out! I haven't tried it for a long duration yet, but as of now, I would recommend this product! For size purposes, he fit the small perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality dog bag
customer_reviews.text: One of the best quality dog carriers on the market. I suggest if you are between sizes to get the larger one and stick some extra padding on the bottom. My corgi is very comfortable and happy in this. It makes it a lot easier to take her places her little legs have a hard time keeping up on.
customer_reviews.author: Andy the Saint

customer_reviews.title: Dog is relaxed in it.
customer_reviews.text: I went by the sizing chart even though I was skeptical but the fit was perfect. Bought the embroidered name patch which is a cool feature to add.
customer_reviews.author: Robinreneep

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poorly executed.
customer_reviews.text: This pack is not constructed well and therefore doesn't distribute my dog's weight well. It puts so much pressure on my shoulders that it's painful. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: NN Hummer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: Works great for transporting my dog on my Vespa but my dog is 27 pounds & not very comfortable, need better padding on the shoulder straps to increase comfort
customer_reviews.author: josue santiago

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to bike with this!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot wait to start biking to work again with this! Pup went in early. Lack of lower leg holes so he rlegs don't hang down and the fact that she's facing me is game changing
customer_reviews.author: bw

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of the best purchases I have made on amazon. This doggy knapsack is awesome for my 9lbs shorkie and she loves it. She fits perfectly. I couldn't be happier! I take her bike ridding, running errands and even downtown sometimes. Yes, it is on the pricier side but trust me it is worth it! Quality is sturdy and so are the straps they fit comfortably esp around my large chest. Great product, well worth the money. I don't normally gives reviews but this was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ketso

customer_reviews.title: Amazing backpack for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Just used them today with our dogs during a bike ride, and this is a must buy! The dogs absolutely loved it and there were no issues at all. We have a 15 and 16 lbs shih tzus and got mediums.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made sturdy and will last
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, it is made sturdy and our corgi loves it. He did not need a block. We used it twice and he only needed the pack half way down and half way up. He was comfortable and did not complain. Great extra pockets for water and snacks. Make to last, glad we purchased because we will be hiking more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder straps need reinforcement
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in August 2019 and here it is Deb 2020. The shoulder straps are coming apart at the seams, and you can also see the runs in the webbing near the top of both straps. I use this to carry my 29 pond Corgi tricolor, so not a significantly heavy dog. Shoulder straps need reinforcing going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get something else.
customer_reviews.text: My dog’s legs cramped up a bit and he limped a few steps after we tried it out. He has a luxating patella. This product can potentially hurt your dog if it has knee problems. The bag doesn’t allow for the dog’s legs to be comfortable. Also, the straps are weirdly placed and dig into the shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Djfhfbsj

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use.
customer_reviews.text: It's well made and well designed but, by the time I get it turned around an on my back--she's figuring out how to turn it upside down and jump out! She fell out once.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this bag soooooo much! We bought the small size for our ten pound cairn terrier mix
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, but nice idea
customer_reviews.text: My pup fit in it fine, but it was NOT comfortable for me at all. Hurt my shoulders and neck. Maybe if the straps were a little better?
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER SHERROD

customer_reviews.title: Great sak Silly pooch
customer_reviews.text: Loved it more than my doofy dog. Had to send it back but hope one day he sees the value of letting me tote him around. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: sha

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but durable
customer_reviews.text: It’s pricy but durable, unfortunately my Shiba Inu is longer than most and didn’t for comfortably
customer_reviews.author: AnnaBanana

customer_reviews.title: Motorcycle riding
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take my dog on motorcycle rides. She loves it and I was stopped by several people who had to take a look. My dog feels secure and we enjoy taking her with us.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Every active dog lover should not go with out one!!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy love's this he likes to ride with me on my bike, going shopping etc.. I had to purchased a larger one as he has grown."The Air". I would recommend this to everyone. Needs a waist strap to keep him balanced better. Otherwise two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly! Our dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has patella instability. Works great when she gets tired ou walking. She seems very comfy !
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: Dog in a bag
customer_reviews.text: The dog still is wanting to excape from the carrier. Start early in your training.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Waiswilos

customer_reviews.title: The safest and most comfortable carrier.  Worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.text: Our Westie gets in and out of the pack calmly and willing. He truly enjoys it and and it fits on our back nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine C. Wood

customer_reviews.title: use mine mostly for when I take my yorkie poo ...
customer_reviews.text: use mine mostly for when I take my yorkie poo for ride on my motorcycle or if I am shopping & don't want her to be outside...
customer_reviews.author: sseely

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My chiuhauha loved it I think I got medium. Ges 11lbs and its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: rcc

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the med for my chiweenie. Fits her perfectly! She loves going everywhere with me. I even use it on front while on the riding mower. No more holding her on my lap.
customer_reviews.author: mommaof2kiddos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect find
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this thing. He is 13lbs and 18” nose to tail. He fits perfectly in a small.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, safe, and fun!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing about this is how secure my dog is when she rides with me. She is able to move around but I know she can’t slip out.
customer_reviews.author: Amariah Kotte

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be made well and fits my pup well.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Seems great but way too difficult to get my dog into
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A must if you have older small dogs that want to go on part of the walk.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppin

customer_reviews.title: No Problem  ordered small returning for med
customer_reviews.text: Liked how it was madem\ but to small, returning and ordering med.
customer_reviews.author: Bud-Cork Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Dog backpack
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is comfortable. It seems to be cumbersome for the user.
customer_reviews.author: Colloni Keener

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Comfortable for walking multiple kilometers with great weight distribution. I wouldn’t use it hiking, but great for city walking or light trekking.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Bring your dog, everywhere, on your back!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog actually loved it, went right in and didn’t move at all...I put a shirt on him first, it was oddly calming for him...thank you for creating it for him, now he can go everywhere with me much easier
customer_reviews.author: Heather A Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Medium is perfect for our 19lb Scotty mix. Plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: SLP89

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how much my dog likes it. Work in progress
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: MY DOG AND I BOTH LOVE THE BACKPACK! SHE JUMPS IN IT AND KNOWS THAT WE GET TO GO FOR A RIDE! EASY TO ADJUST FOR PERFECT FITTING AND COMFORTABLE FOR BOTH OF US
customer_reviews.author: ReBecca

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Mr Po loves it! Now we can go for longer walks because when he tires out we pop him in the backpack and continue on.
customer_reviews.author: E Medina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful product extraordinarily well made. My dog loves it and jumps right in now.
customer_reviews.author: Himiff Diff Duff

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES her new backpack
customer_reviews.text: The size fit her perfectly , she loved walking around with me. It’s absolutely fantastic 😍
customer_reviews.author: DOLLY DIAZ

customer_reviews.title: Ease of carrying my Harlie
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this doggy backpack. Harlie can run for a 1/2 mile but then it's time for a ride. The pack is comfortable and evenly distributes the weight. She is 24 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Eskins

customer_reviews.title: ... ok in the bag but the backpack doesn't feel comfortable on my back
customer_reviews.text: The dog fits ok in the bag but the backpack doesn't feel comfortable on my back. They need to improve the design a bit. I wouldn't recommend for any long hikes or walks. I use it primarily to go on the bike and it's ok for 10 to 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: size small for 12.5 lb mini poodle
customer_reviews.text: size small fit my 12.5 pound mini poodle very well. highly recommend this. he loved being carried around.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Collins

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The zipper isn't strong enuf to hold a wiggly pup. It broke the first day.
customer_reviews.author: c s.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Seems to fit ok just need to get her used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Jeffords

customer_reviews.title: love them. Wish the Pro with the extra pack ...
customer_reviews.text: We have two for our shih tau...love them. Wish the Pro with the extra pack came in red if so we would have gotten Pros
customer_reviews.author: Wholigan

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it. Dogs are older, and cant walk 3 miles like they used to. This way, they can still come along.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Blum

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice
customer_reviews.text: My 10kg dog fits perfectly in the sack, he has neurological problems and cannot climb up and down stairs nor do long walks só this is a great solution for him not to stay at home
customer_reviews.author: NEUS BIOSCA

customer_reviews.title: My rescue who is afraid of everything loves this. ...
customer_reviews.text: My rescue who is afraid of everything loves this. He can now be part of the pack and go on walks.
customer_reviews.author: Amber K Techlin

customer_reviews.title: Lucy is 22 pounds and so a 2nd person is ...
customer_reviews.text: Lucy is 22 pounds and so a 2nd person is needed to help me get her up on my back. Once she’s there, we’re “a go” and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Noyd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves being able to come with us in her K9 Sport Sack! The product fits exactly like promised. It is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 25 pound didn’t fit into sack. Very narrow. Please state all dimensions
customer_reviews.author: Caren L. McElhenny

customer_reviews.title: I have a 16. 76 lbs dog, I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16.76 lbs dog, I bougth for her a M size because she is still a puppy so I expected she gorws a Little bit more, for sizing she is an S. So also I bougth the Block Booster.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fits my Yorkie just right. Can not wait to take him bike riding in the spring!
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality I love the sake I wish I would have seen the following block when I ordered the bag but I can order it later my puppy is a little too short for it but it is a great bag. I do not have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya A.

product_meta.title: K9 Sport Sack Air Forward Facing Backpack Red Dog Carrier
feature_bullets: Comfortable Straps For Hiking, Biking, Outdoor Activities
Easy-pull Zipper With D-ring For Collar Hook Up Safely Secures Your Dog
Extra Long Sternum Strap With Whistle Clip
